text: palao baegseongdeul-ui udumeoli deul-i malhadeola pyehaneun mosewa geu ui baegseongdeul-i jisang-e haeag-eul peoteu lyeo pyehawa pyehaui sindeul-eul ulongha dolog dul geos-ibnikka lago malhani geu ga daedabhayeossdeola geudeul-ui aiga namjaigeodeun salhaehago yeoaman sal-anam gehayeo geudeul-eul jibaehal geos-ila
